mapper.select: SELECT F.*, IFNULL(C.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__clientName, IFNULL(E.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__expertName FROM `funeral` AS O LEFT JOIN `client` AS C ON F.clientId = C.id LEFT JOIN `expert` AS E ON F.expertId = E.id ORDER BY F.id DESC

SELECT F.*, IFNULL(C.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__clientName, IFNULL(E.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__expertName FROM `funeral` AS F LEFT JOIN `client` AS C ON F.clientId = C.id LEFT JOIN `expert` AS E ON F.expertId = E.id WHERE 1
OR F.expertId = #{expertId}
OR (SELECT funeralId FROM funeralRelAssts WHERE assistantId = #{assistantId})
ORDER BY F.id DESC

SELECT O.*, IFNULL(C.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__clientName, IFNULL(E.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__expertName FROM `order` AS O LEFT JOIN `client` AS C ON O.clientId = C.id LEFT JOIN `expert` AS E ON O.expertId = E.id WHERE O.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM `order` ORDER BY id DESC
